# se-radio-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Optional property that defines if the switch is disabled.  Set to `false` by default.                                         | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | Determines whether or not the switch is "on" or "off" when you initialize it. Sets the switch to the "on" position if `true`. | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                                                                           | Type               |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `didChange` | Send the state of the switch (true/false) to the parent component when it is toggled. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
